title: (x) City of Angels - Victorian {Mark S}
content:
Hi,

Anybody recognize the typeface (I assume it's not custom) that spells out "City of Angels" on this [t-shirt](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011200700/http:/www.urgentgear.com/Merchant2/graphics/micros/large/MZST-509-C.jpg).

Thanks!
author: antiphrasis

comments.content:
Mark,

Thanks a bunch! That's perfect, the exact font I was looking for.
